Pre-Game Insights: Wales are still strong contenders for promotion from League B Group 4
Montenegro are yet to pick up a point in the group and are relegation bound
Wales surrendered a 2-0 half-time advantage to draw their last match against Iceland
Montenegro lost 1-0 to Turkey in their last match
Wales boss Craig Bellamy began his reign in September, with a goalless draw against Turkey being followed by a 2-1 victory in Montenegro
